title: The PCOS Plan: Prevent and Reverse Polycystic Ovary Syndrome through Diet and Fasting - Audiolibro - Nadia Brito Pateguana, Jason Fung - Storytel
description: PCOS affects 1 in 10 women of childbearing age, and is the most common reproductive disorder in the world  PCOS is a significant health concern: it is
cleaned_text: 4.1 Crecimiento personal PCOS affects 1 in 10 women of childbearing age, and is the most common reproductive disorder in the world PCOS is a significant health concern: it is associated with higher risks of heart disease, ovarian and diabetes Addresses a significant gap in public health knowledge: the connection between diet and the reversal of PCOS is not well known By the author of the bestsellers The Obesity Code (half a million copies sold) and The Diabetes Code (more than 100,000 copies sold), Dr. Jason Fung Backed by science and personal experience: Dr. Nadia Brito Pateguana is a naturopathic doctor with a focus on helping people with PCOS overcome infertility, but personally used the advice recipes in this book to help conceive two healthy, happy girls © 2020 Greystone Books (Audiolibro): 9781771648042 Fecha de lanzamiento Audiolibro: 14 de abril de 2020 Tags 4.1 Crecimiento personal PCOS affects 1 in 10 women of childbearing age, and is the most common reproductive disorder in the world PCOS is a significant health concern: it is associated with higher risks of heart disease, ovarian and diabetes Addresses a significant gap in public health knowledge: the connection between diet and the reversal of PCOS is not well known By the author of the bestsellers The Obesity Code (half a million copies sold) and The Diabetes Code (more than 100,000 copies sold), Dr. Jason Fung Backed by science and personal experience: Dr. Nadia Brito Pateguana is a naturopathic doctor with a focus on helping people with PCOS overcome infertility, but personally used the advice recipes in this book to help conceive two healthy, happy girls © 2020 Greystone Books (Audiolibro): 9781771648042 Fecha de lanzamiento Audiolibro: 14 de abril de 2020 Tags Descubre un mundo infinito de historias Calificación general basada en 25 reseñas Útil Inspirador Interesante Descarga la app para unirte a la conversación y agregar reseñas.
